name: Wrong Side of the Forest
description:
Seraphina wakes up in an odd forest full of creatures and ghosts. How will she get home? It's up to you.  You the player will navigate the character around, while dealing with hazards. There are three possible endings and four unlockable special features. The game type is similar to Shivers, Myst, Maniac Mansion, or other Point-and-Click Adventures of the 90s. The graphics are meant to evoke a sort-of low-resolution PS1-type graphics. This game was made for the Haunted PS1 Summer of Shivers.

This is my first published game. Let me know what you think.
